title: Quick Care
shortDescription: Developed Firebase-based appointment booking system with real-time notifications, secure document storage, and integrated payment flows.

title: AcademIQ
shortDescription: Built AI educational chatbot with configurable modes, custom session management, and Isar DB for offline chat history access.

title: Side Hustle
shortDescription: Created rewards platform with game install tracking via multiple SDKs (Singular, AppsFlyer, Adjust) and secure Google/Apple authentication.

title: Diecarz
shortDescription: Developed Firebase toy car collection app with CSV import, community features, and Mixpanel analytics, achieving 99.9% crash-free usage.

title: Caregiver Management App
shortDescription: Enhanced healthcare app with real-time multilingual chat translation and task assignment, achieving 30% improved user retention and 40% fewer bugs.

title: JackJack
shortDescription: Built BLE-based child monitoring app with real-time sound level tracking, live audio streaming, and threshold-based notifications for caregivers.

title: AI Planner
shortDescription: Upgraded AI scheduling app from Claude 3.5 to OpenAI APIs with structured outputs, reducing response time by 50% and optimizing state management for enhanced performance.
